name: Michael Ohr
dietary_requirements: No wheat for me, please (i.e. no pasta, no bread)
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Been actively developing in Javascript since 2009. Built https://carsharing.mvg-mobil.de and https://www.zebramobil.de/i/
what_can_i_contribute: Share experience building map based Javascript apps using leaflet.js; and share experience building mobility apps, i.e. carsharing, bikesharing, public transit
